00020         class Exception: public std::exception
00021         {
00022         public:
00023 
00024                 Exception(const char* msg, int code = 0);
00025 
00026                 Exception(const char* msg, const char* arg, int code = 0);
00027 
00029                 Exception(const char* msg, const Exception& nested, int code = 0);
00030 
00031                 Exception(const Exception& other);
00032 
00033                 ~Exception() throw();
00034 
00035                 Exception& operator = (const Exception& exc);
00036 
00038                 virtual const char* className() const throw();
00039 
00041                 const char* message() const;
00042 
00044                 virtual const char* what() const throw();
00045                 
00047                 const Exception* nested() const;
00048 
00050                 int code() const;
00051

00056 
00058                 virtual void release();
00059 
00061 
00064                 virtual void rethrow() const;
00065 
00066         private:
00067                 char*           m_msg;
00068                 Exception*  m_nested;
00069                 int                     m_code;
00070         };

00096 #define SF_DECLARE_EXCEPTION(Name, Base)                                                                        \
00097         class Name: public Base                                                                                                 \
00098         {                                                                                                                                               \
00099         public:                                                                                                                                 \
00100                 Name(const char* msg, int code = 0);                                                            \
00101                 Name(const char* msg, const char* arg, int code = 0);                           \
00102                 Name(const char* msg, const Exception& nested, int code = 0);           \
00103                 Name(const Name& other);                                                                                \
00104                 ~Name() throw();                                                                                                        \
00105                 Name& operator = (const Name& exc);                                                                     \
00106                 const char* className() const throw();                                                          \
00107                 Name* clone() const;                                                                                            \
00108                 void release();                                                                                                         \
00109                 void rethrow() const;                                                                                           \
00110         };
00111 
00113 
00114 #define SF_IMPLEMENT_EXCEPTION(Name, Base)                                                                                                              \
00115         Name::Name(const char* msg, int code) : Base(msg, code) { }                                                                     \
00116         Name::Name(const char* msg, const char* arg, int code) : Base(msg, arg, code) { }                       \
00117         Name::Name(const char* msg, const Exception& nested, int code) : Base(msg, nested, code) { }\
00118         Name::Name(const Name& other) : Base(other) { }                                                                                         \
00119         Name::~Name() throw() { }                                                                                                                                       \
00120         Name& Name::operator = (const Name& exc) { Base::operator = (exc); return *this; }                      \
00121         const char* Name::className() const throw() { return #Name; }                                                           \
00122         Name* Name::clone() const { return new Name(*this); }                                                                           \
00123         void Name::release() { delete this; }                                                                                                           \
00124         void Name::rethrow() const { throw *this; }
00125 
00127 
00128         SF_DECLARE_EXCEPTION(LogicException, Exception)
00129         SF_DECLARE_EXCEPTION(InvalidArgumentException, LogicException)
00130         SF_DECLARE_EXCEPTION(NotImplementedException, LogicException)
00131         SF_DECLARE_EXCEPTION(RangeException, LogicException)
00132 
00134 
00135         SF_DECLARE_EXCEPTION(RuntimeException, Exception)
00136         SF_DECLARE_EXCEPTION(NotFoundException, RuntimeException)
00137         SF_DECLARE_EXCEPTION(ExistsException, RuntimeException)
00138         SF_DECLARE_EXCEPTION(TimeoutException, RuntimeException)
00139         SF_DECLARE_EXCEPTION(NoPermissionException, RuntimeException)
00140         SF_DECLARE_EXCEPTION(IOException, RuntimeException)
